name: Chroma Blast (itch) (William Cheek)
description:
Chroma Blast is a fast paced twin stick shooter with many different styles of play where you fight through waves of enemies while constantly leveling up your ships colorful arsenal. Battle your friends and challenge yourself in the local leaderboards, or seek out a true test of skill for those good enough to find it.

Chroma Blast can also be found on Steam with an online leaderboard and achievements!
